Parameters: int: The status of the communication. Must be one of the defined status constants above.
int: The type of the DRM information processed. Must be a valid type for @B_android#drm#DrmInfoRequest_E@.
DrmInfoStatus(int,int,android.drm.Proces.Description: Creates a DrmInfoStatus object with the specified parameters.
DrmInfoStatus(int,int,android.drm.Proces.FullName: public DrmInfoStatus (int statusCode, int infoType, ProcessedData data, String mimeType)

ClassDesc: An entity class that wraps the result of communication between a device and an online DRM server. Specifically, when the @B_android#drm#DrmManagerClient#processDrmInfo_E@ method is called, an instance of DrmInfoStatus is returned. This class contains the @B_android#drm#ProcessedData_E@ object, which can be used to instantiate a @B_android#drm#DrmRights_E@ object during license acquisition.
